description: Detects an appx package added the pipeline of the "to be processed" packages which is downloaded from a suspicious domain
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Suspicious Remote AppX Package Locations
query: (winlog.event_id:"854" AND winlog.event_data.Path:(*transfer.sh* OR *raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *send.exploit.in* OR *privatlab.net* OR *privatlab.com* OR *sendspace.com*))
